title: DPM reviews proposals for reduction of electricity tariff for industry
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Thursday chaired a meeting to review proposals for reduction of electricity tariff for industry.
The meeting was attended by Ministers of Finance, Power, Economic Affairs, Minister of State of Power & Information Technology, Federal Secretaries of Ministries of Finance, Power, Chairman FBR and other officials of relevant departments.
The Deputy Prime Minister reviewed the existing policies and reiterated governmentâ€™s resolve to extend support to the industrial sector.
He directed the concerned ministries to make all efforts to provide relief to the consumers of electricity in industrial sector.
